Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light pink-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Menon. Trimmed. Drawn by Petrie (Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 181, 12).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0608)
